page.title: 18A Gloucester Family
page.content: The members of my family are: {David}my brother 9 years goes to Kingsholm Primary.My Dad,{Ken,is a Fire Man he likes his job, somtimes it is dangerous.He doesn't like doing the gardening much.He likes shopping.He goes to watch the rugby at Kingsholm. He also likes going to the Queens Head for a drink.My{mum,Margaret}is a secretary at Birds Eye Walls she likes her job too.She likes to do the decorating and gardening.My mum doesn't like doing the house work or the ironing so my dad does some house chores.I'm called{Louise}11 years I go to Kingsholm Primary as well.I will be going to Denmark High School in Sept 1985.We have a pet dog Frisky,two gold fish Bubble and Squeek.Bubble is called Bubble because he/she is large, Squeek is called Squeek because he/she is skinny.
